title: 15 Min Cardio Workout To Lose Belly Fat At Home
description:
This short cardio workout has the mission of helping you reduce your belly fat, so that you can get a flat stomach without those love handles.

Being a cardio workout, it will elevate your heart-rate and boost your metabolism so that your body starts burning calories faster.

Additionally, with the help of ABS exercises that target specifically your abdominal muscles you will start getting a lean and fat-less belly.

I recommend you do the whole workout till the end. Don't skip exercises and don't pause for too long. Work out every day of the week if you want to see good results!

Make sure you subscribe to Roberta's Gym channel to receive video workouts regularly: every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday!

Leave me a comment below the video and tell me if it was easy or hard for you. Good luck!
channelDescription:
I'm here to help you look and feel great, with effective body weight workouts and exercises.

Burn calories and extra fat with simple workout routines you can easily do at home. No equipment or gym necessary.

New video workouts Monday to Friday and then Sunday as well.

comments: I like the way she says you are almost there... I just wait for it. Day 1, let's hope I go through this for a month or two .... The trainer is awesome.
I have been doing it since last month...And you'll not believe the result ka just superb...Thank you so much😊

Keeping track for a week.

Day 1- ✅ Not too hard, no results yet.
Day 2- ✅Pretty straightforward, a little burn in the abs area.
Day 3- ✅ Felt more burn than the previous day.
Day 4- ✅ Seeing minimal results, but making progress.
Day 5- ✅ Getting Easier
Day 6- ✅ I'm less bloated than I used to be.
Day 7- ✅ My stomach is almost entirely flat.

1)side bends 12sets
2)back turn 12sets
3)jumping jacks 30sets
4)rest 20sec
5)running in place 40sets
6)rest 25sec
7)cross crunches 12sets
8)rest 25sec
9)plank jacks 20sets
10)rest 30sec
11)ski hops 12sets
12)rest 25sec
13)mpuntain climber 20sets
14)rest 30sec
15)jumping jacks 30sets
16)rest 30sec
17)running in place 40sets
18)rest 30sec
19)reach through 15sets
20)rest 35min
21)heel touch 20sets
22)rest 35min
23)jumping oblique twist 30sets
24)rest 30sec
25)russian twist 14sets
26)rest 30sec
27)jumping jacks 30sets
28)rest 30sec
29)running in place 40sets
30)complete!

Day 1✓
Day 2✓ (honestly, this workout is really good even for the ones who want to come back to their workout routine like me. I am happy that I am coming back to routine. )
Day 3✓
